events.message: Customer reported a vehicle accident involving a collision with another car on the highway. Initial details have been recorded.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and keywords related to car collision.
An experienced claims agent has been assigned to manage this case and coordinate next steps for the auto accident claim.
The customer was contacted to acknowledge receipt of the claim and to reassure them that the case is being handled promptly.
The insurance company requested the customer to submit police reports, photographs of car damage, and driver license copies.
Customer has submitted all required documents including accident photos, police report, and medical bills related to the car collision.
Our claims department has started an investigation into the circumstances surrounding the vehicle accident and related damages.
Investigation has concluded confirming that the other party was at fault in the car collision, validating the claim details.
A settlement amount was proposed to the customer, adequately covering the repair costs and medical expenses from the accident.
Customer provided positive feedback expressing satisfaction with the timely response and the proposed settlement for the accident.
The claim has been formally approved following all verifications and customer acceptance of the proposed settlement terms.
Insurance payment covering the damages sustained in the vehicle accident was issued successfully to the customer's bank account.
The car accident claim has been officially closed following completion of payment and final customer confirmation.
All claim records and documentation related to the auto accident case have been securely archived for future reference.
